short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is a stop-gap solution for visitors to Baskinrobbins.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BRBr - A Baskinrobbins.com Bugfix

The Problem

In 2014, and perhaps earlier the Baskinrobbins.com website has had a bug wherein the category of "Bright Choices" ice creams has been incorrectly displaying as "BRight Choices"

A Stop-Gap Solution For Baskinrobbins.com Users

The goal of this extension is to allow Chrome browser users who frequent those pages to see the correct capitalization of the "Bright Choices" string. The extension will work seamlessly, completely shielding a user from the bug without compromising the performance, functionality, or look-and-feel of the baskinrobbins.com website.

BRBr is, and will always be free, with no in-app purchases for later functionality. 

This is only under the "Fun" category because it's fun to have correct casing.
